subject: Re: [junit] which jdk will work with JUnit on Redhat6.2?
msgSnippet: ... Do you have a Bug Parade URL handy? -- Joi Ellis                    Software Engineer Aravox Technologies          joi@aravox.com, gyles19@visi.com No
messageBody:
On Fri, 19 Jan 2001, Robert Sartin wrote:

> The other two errors were bad returns that look just like the result of
> a bug in the current Linux JVM from Sun. JVM bugs do not necessarily
> cause crashes. This is a known bug at java.sun.com.

Do you have a Bug Parade URL handy?

--
Joi Ellis Software Engineer
Aravox Technologies joi@..., gyles19@...

No matter what we think of Linux versus FreeBSD, etc., the one thing I
really like about Linux is that it has Microsoft worried. Anything
that kicks a monopoly in the pants has got to be good for something.
- Chris Johnson
